# clevercloud_default_loadbalancer (Data Source)

Fetches information about the default load balancer for a Clever Cloud application



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `application_id` (String) The application ID for which to fetch the load balancer

### Read-Only

- `cname` (String) The CNAME record for the load balancer
- `name` (String) The name of the load balancer (usually matches the region)
- `servers` (List of String) The list of A records (IP addresses) for the load balancer
